燐字的基本解释

燐
lín
同“磷”。

燐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lín］
［《廣韻》力珍切，平真，來。］
(1)化学元素之一。其单体至少有两种同素异形体：白燐（亦称“黄燐”）和红燐（亦称“赤燐”）。前者为淡黄色结晶，剧毒，在空气中易自燃，发光；后者为暗红色粉末，无臭，无毒，不易氧化。
(2)燐火。
(3)萤火。
(4)光闪烁貌。参见“燐燐”、“燐爛”。

燐字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燐； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页683第05
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?良刃切，音吝。【說文】本作㷠。詳㷠字註。【淮南子·汜論訓】老槐生火，久血爲燐。　又【詩·豳風·熠耀宵行傳】熠燿，燐也。燐，螢火也。　又【廣韻】力珍切【集韻】【韻會】離珍切，?音鄰。又【集韻】里忍切，音嶙。義?同。

Sing
Basic explanation of words
Sing
lín
Same as "phosphorus".
Sing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lín］
["Guang Yun", cherish and cut it, plain, come. ]
(1) One of the chemical elements. Its monomer has at least two allotropes: Bai Rin (also known as "Huang Rin") and Hong Rin (also known as "Chi Rin"). The former is light yellow crystal, highly toxic, easy to spontaneously combust and emit light in the air; the latter is dark red powder, odorless, non-toxic, and not easy to oxidize.
(2) Burning fire.
(3) Firefly.
(4) Light flashing appearance. See "Lin Rotten", "Lin Rotten".
Sing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　燐; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 683 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Good blade cut, mean sound. 【Said the text】This work is 㷠. Detailed 㷠 word note. [Huainanzi·Fun Lun Xun] Laohuai makes fire, and long-term blood is 燐.　[Poetry·Binfeng·Yi Yao Xiao Xing Biography] Yi Yao, Lin Ye. Rin, firefly also.　[Guangyun] Li Zhenqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Leaving Zhenqie, next to the sound. Also 【Jiyun】relieved and cut, and the sound is choppy. Righteous? Same.
